## Description {#details}

Manage lifetime of a slot tracker for printing IR.

Wrapper around the <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slottracker">SlotTracker</a></em> used internally by <em>AsmWriter</em>. This class allows callers to share the cost of incorporating the metadata in a module or a function.

If the IR changes from underneath <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/moduleslottracker">ModuleSlotTracker</a></em>, strings like &quot;&lt;badref&gt;&quot; will be printed, or, worse, the wrong slots entirely.

Definition at line 44 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/moduleslottracker-h">ModuleSlotTracker.h</a>.

### ModuleSlotTracker() {#a3a3c5926b6c7c2143f52447c7ab857c0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ModuleSlotTracker::ModuleSlotTracker (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42; M, bool ShouldInitializeAllMetadata=<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>)</>}
  labels = {["explicit"]}>
Construct a slot tracker from a module.

If <em>M</em> is <code>nullptr</code>, uses a null slot tracker. Otherwise, initializes a slot tracker, and initializes all metadata slots. <code>ShouldInitializeAllMetadata</code> defaults to true because this is expected to be shared between multiple callers, and otherwise <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> references will not match up.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/moduleslottracker-h/#l00071">71</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/moduleslottracker-h">ModuleSlotTracker.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/asmwriter-cpp/#l00882">882</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/asmwriter-cpp">AsmWriter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### getLocalSlot() {#a6d82623735b3bd2208170d379913f2e1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>int ModuleSlotTracker::getLocalSlot (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; V)</>}>
Return the slot number of the specified local value.

A function that defines this value should be incorporated prior to calling this method. Return -1 if the value is not in the function&#39;s <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slottracker">SlotTracker</a>.

Purge the currently incorporated function and incorporate <code>F</code>. If <code>F</code> is currently incorporated, this is a no-op.
